评论详情: I would give this 100 stars if I could. I wear this (and the 7 others I bought in various colors) every day to the gym. It is the most comfortable top ever! I am somewhat busty but don’t need an additional sports bra with it as the built in support is more than enough. It has light padding which gives a seamless look and super durable. They have gone through many wash cycles and don’t show any wear. I love the different colors and will definitely be buying more colors to add to my rotation. Absolutely love them!!!

Checks all the boxes: cute, comfortable, functional. I wear this bra for every day wear and sports from gym to outdoor running. The cut is so cute and flattering, with good support. Maybe not be as supportive for bigger chest, but I have no problem running or doing other high intensity workouts in this bra. 36B/34C for reference.

I am 5’7” 125Lbs a 36B chest and typically a true medium. However, this medium fit too small. It rides up near the armpit area. I missed the return window, but planning on ordering a large because it’s super cute, comfortable, the padding doesn’t bunch up. It’s a good thick material and so soft.

I’m a 36A cup (wide shoulders). I normally wear a large and I’m wearing a large in these photos. I absolutely LOVE these! They are so much of a staple that I have three white ones and one yellow. I’ve washed them multiple times- no discolorations, no shrinkage, no pilling! Soft and hugging stretch, not a firm material so it moves with your body. It doesn’t seem like it would be as secure as it actually is. I do sometime cover my chest when bending over because I feel like there can be a bit of open gap between breast and bra but not by much. Wouldn’t be my first pick for deadlift days. The straps do not slip off even when running. It has a shelf bra and after every wash I never have to adjust the little pads, they just stay in place, so that’s really convenient. I do a lot of running in these and so with all that bouncing I NEVER have to adjust this top during my workout, it’s my #1 top for my big cardio days or back days (to see the muscle). Give it a chance, it might turn out to be your favorite! So comfy.

评论概述: Really cute but the straps are insanely short
评论详情: The straps are so short the shirt rubs too tightly on my armpits. There's no breathing room at A L L. Idk who's shoulders/armpits this would fit
This top has a buttery feel to it and fits true to size. The bottom does not ride up like I was afraid it might and it keeps everything contained! Will be purchasing in more colors.
super cute and good quality material. would buy again. padding isn't bulky, but adds good support.

Love this padded cami/sports top! Quality soft material that is not see through. Read the reviews and decided to size up, glad I did - the underarm area is pretty high and could cut into your skin of too tight. I am typically a small in most tops but sized up to Medium and fits perfectly.  Really love the back detail and open back - not suffocating like alot of sports tops can be. I will definitely double this as a cami too!

Okay I an seriously OBSESSED with this brand , I haven't ordered any leggings from them yet but the tops are everything! They are so buttery smooth and they also have great support for the girls. I have ordered 3 tops from them so far and love love love every one

I have been trying to find a decent backless/low back bra to wear to accommodate an upcoming back tattoo. I’ve tried on and returned several that claimed to work for bustier/plus size figures. But this is great! It’s soft and comfortable, not binding or tight anywhere, and I feel like my chest is corralled enough that I could throw a work top over this and feel ok going into the office. I’m very glad I have this one a shot.  For reference, I wear a 14/16 in pants, and bras are usually a 40DD, and the XL in this bra fits me well.
I love these sport bras for the gym and have gotten so many compliments for them. They are true to size and I also like the colors.

My bra size range is 32/34 DD/DDD and the M fits nearly perfectly. I can’t believe how supportive this backless sports bra is, it truly is the most comfortable I’ve worn because there’s no back to secure - back fat and rolls be gone!! Will definitely buy more and try the S for a more snug fit.
My only negative is that I ordered my recommended size. It was too tight. Order a size up
Could be a little more supportive I’m busty. But I am 5’6 157 lbs and 34 DDD. Ordered a large and maybe a medium would work better! Overall I love it! I want more

评论概述: Go with your normal size—size chart is off
评论详情: Love the low back, but definitely was 1-2 sizes larger than what would fit me. Amazon’s recommended size and the size chart which both indicated I get an XXL, but given that I’m usually a M-L, I opted for an XL. Whelp, still too big. Probably an L (my normal bra size) have been best. Could have gone with M if I wanted more support but less comfort. I’m also not a fan of removable cups, which these have.

I am normally very picky about sports bras. As someone who wears a 34 DD I like to feel supported, but also want to be able to breathe. I honestly had my doubts something with this little fabric on the back and thin straps could be very supportive. After reading all the positive reviews, I decided to give it a try. I am SO glad that I did because I absolutely love this sports bra!!  The support underneath is comfortable. The straps don’t dig and the back is so fun. I definitely plan on purchasing more..
The shoulders slip a little and so that can be annoying but it’s super comfortable otherwise
Great quality! Love the fit!

I’m a 34B and where a small/medium in most shirts. I’ve ordered this shirt before in a medium and it was just too cropped for my liking. I included a video of the shirt with and without the bra pads. The size large I ordered is perfect length of my liking, the “lats” part of the shirt is just big but I’m okay with it. It’s really not that noticeable. I do feel like wearing the bra pads does fill that part of the shirt out and they’re not uncomfortable to wear so I’ll keep them in.

I’m 5’6” 180-85lbs I have broad shoulders and hips. I have a Long Torso. 30” waist 39” hips I bought the size Large and it fits perfectly. The straps many people complained about feeling like they would fall off. I understand that complaint however it works for me because of my broad shoulders. I plan to wear it as a swim top! I’m so excited. It’s thick very soft material that has quite a bit of stretch. It’s longer on my waist than anticipated which is exciting because I have a very long torso compared to my legs.

Typically I wear a size M in sports bras/tops strictly due to my breast size. I am a 32 DDD. This is not the most supportive top so i opted to size down to the S. I only use this for upper body days/light cardio. Hope this helps!

This bra is so cute and very comfortable. The color options are great and the fit during wear is ideal. It doesn’t slide upward and allows for an open back concept which is why I bought it. Would buy again in various colors!

*not a paid review* I’m a 34C and this bra is a HIT! It is medium support, comfortable and soft. The straps are wide set on shoulders so I can wear in with wide boat neck tops as well. Looks GREAT with strapy summer dresses and my workout gear. I bought in red and it is true to color. I love it so much I am going to purchase the aqua color. I have also used it as a swim top. Probably my MOST fav thing is the back strap stays low over the bra bulge.

I have a skin condition that requires I get air circulation to my back. The back is low enough that i can wear it under the backless shirts I purchased. The straps slip off the shoulders on occasion, but not overly obnoxious. There is not a lot of support and I have a very heavy chest, so for practical purposes, this is NOT for heavy chests. But for my specific need, it has come in quite handy. I really like how pretty this is. A version with actual cups would be nice for us curvy girls.

评论概述: Cute! Less for exercise, more for athleisure.
评论详情: This top is cute and seems to be well-made. 4 stars because it isn’t supportive enough for actual exercise if you’ve got a bigger chest. Also because the pads do nothing for larger boobs and I had to remove them. For reference I’m 5’3, 176lbs, 36D bra size, and I got the L. It’s snug but does not create any awkward lumps or rolls. I considered sizing up but I think I made the right call because I can see how a larger size might make the non-adjustable straps too loose. I’ll probably order 1-2 more in different colors.

This top is very cute. I especially love the back twist detailing, the only downside I could say is the armpits fit a little weird its kind of high up. That being said, I don’t think it is the most flattering look in the front because of this some might say this could happen if the top is too small, but if that is the case, then this top would not run true to size. I ordered a medium and I am usually a medium and GYM clothing aside from that. I love it. I also love that it has a built-in bra , has good length on the tummy, and it is not see-through.

My friend has this top and it looks great on her. I found the straps to be oddly short but somehow too big so it looks strange around the armpits but doesn’t feel secure. I’m 5’2 117lb and got the small.

I was looking for a new workout bra postpartum that would provide good support and this sports bra does just that! The color is just as pictured. I like the cute twist in the back and how wide the double straps are on the shoulders. The only con I would note is that this bra can roll up while working out, feel like sometimes I have to adjust/roll the fabric back down throughout a workout.
It looks cute, the straps don’t stay put. The bra itself rolls up from the bottom.

评论概述: So flattering, soft, and fits like a glove!
评论详情: My chest is so deflated but kinda large so it's SOOOO hard to find tops that fit and are flattering. But omg. This thing is two layers, the bottom-most one having the most support for the chest. The top layer is just the cute front part. It's so buttery soft, the open back is so nice (I live in FL) and the straps stay on quite comfortably despite my shapeless round shoulders lol. Also, I'm totally built like a muscly fridge (reference, I'm 5'9" and 155lbs, size 34D and got a M) yet I feel so dainty with this lol  Overall 10/10 I need it in more colors now! Be warned of a super PLASTIC smell fresh out the package but all new clothes should be washed immediately anyways!

评论概述: Very cute, not optimal for working out
评论详情: I love the look of this top but it's simply not supportive enough to work out in.

I love how this looks & fits, for being an open back sports bra it has great support for the girls. Only downside is if you have some armpit fat it bulges slightly there. I'd order this in every color if I could.
Very cute and fits nicely. I get a lot of compliments when wearing it!

评论概述: Ultimate Comfort: The Perfect All-Day, All-Activity Sports Bra!
评论详情: This sports bra is an absolute game-changer for low-impact activities! The built-in bra offers just the right amount of support for yoga, weight lifting, or even just chilling at home. It's so comfortable that you might forget you're even wearing it! I'm already eyeing more colors to add to my closet—this one's definitely a winner.

The top is really soft and fits well (5’9, 120 lbs, 32B and ordered small) like others reviews mentioned, but the white one shows the layer underneath too much. Returning the white one and ordering a darker color hoping it’s not as conspicuous.

评论概述: The straps fall off your shoulder
评论详情: I loved the style, I got a size large and it was my usual size. The straps fall off soooooo easily especially doing back day. If you have a wider back or bigger shoulders, this top will not be comfortable for the gym. If you have narrow shoulders, it should fit way better.
I LOVE this top! It is so cute and very soft. The only con (in my opinion) is the straps are not adjustable so it does ride up my armpit more than I’d like. Besides that it is amazing!
Love the built in bra. Washes up well but runs a little small if you have a wider back

I ordered a medium and I'm a 34d. It's a super cute sports bra but it felt too big and I wasn't comfortable in it. I felt like I wasn't being supported enough. I'm going to reorder and order a small and see if that works.
Love this top for working out or athleisure wear. It's definitely a new staple and I will be ordering more in different colors. The open back is so flattering too!
Never actually wore it but I do find it uncomfortable.
This is a very good looking sports bra. It has a low back, but is very supportive and comfortable. Highly recommend.
I have this bra in multiple colors. It’s very comfortable. Would not be running supportive though. Super cute though!

评论概述: This runs as expected, not small like others say.
评论详情: The product seems fine, but I listened to everyone's reviews about how it runs small and that is not true. It runs true to size if not a little bit on the small side. I am generally a large to XL size person with a 38C top, but smaller side of C.  So I ordered the large based on others reviews. It's too tight! I have side boob fat falling out the sides and it looks ridiculous and I also have back fat falling over the entire edge of the back.  So, if you are an XL, order an XL!  I'm so mad because I ordered the first one on sale and the second replacement one is not and you can't exchange with Amazon. That's the sucky part of all this.  So note to self, order 2 and then return the one you don't want and save yourself money and the headache.
Cute but straps are a bit on the edge of the shoulders

These were my favorites, but either they shrunk or I got thicker. It’s very supportive and I get secure the whole time. The top is narrow where the strings leave the fabric and the bottom rolls up super easily. Otherwise they are super comfortable and flattering. Didn’t have an issue with the straps moving around though so that’s nice. If you have any extra meat on your upper body I’d recommend sizing up, which is what I’m going to start doing if I buy more of these, that way when they shrink (or I get bigger) it’ll fit like normal

评论概述: Size down for D cup and above
评论详情: It takes some time to trust that the straps won’t fall down as it sits very far out on my shoulders, but they didn’t budge during free weights or a brisk walk on the treadmill. It’s going to bunch up while you move and sometimes you can see where the cup pads are. From the back, you can’t really see the twist part. Overall, I’d say it’s okay for weight lifting and moderate cardio. I wouldn’t do a HIIT class or Zumba class since this top may require some adjusting with bigger movements. I like to size down on any kind of sports bra type top. I’m a 34D and the small fits just fine. I gave 4 stars because part of the stitching became loose after a wash. I emailed their customer service and they sent me a new one for free! To avoid another snag, I’d avoid washing it with items that have hooks or zippers.

I honestly didn’t have high hopes for this. I have 32DD and Have to have support. This has the support needed. I maybe could go up to a medium but gonna see how it fits after washed. I got a small and I’m 5’1, 110 pounds. Will definitely be ordering more colors!
I wear this top a lot to go out in! Super comfy & big b00b certified(:

This is a very cool top. I have been eyeing it for awhile so I got it. It's so pretty and really flattering. I would say, it is a little hard to work out in because the straps fall. I definitely have more broad shoulders even and it can slip down. I got it in white and would rather honestly wear this out and about rather than work out! It's a great athletic top but this material is sooo on trend right now anway!! It's a cute top, but the straps MAY fall on you too.

I love this top! I was hesitant to  purchase, worried the straps would need constant adjusting, but I was pleasantly surprised to learn that wasn't the case. This top moves with you and with my yoga and pilates I move A LOT! I've worn and washed multiple times and it's holding up. I'm definitely ordering more! for reference, I'm 5' 5" and 147 lbs I ordered medium. Hope this helps!
5’4.5” 150lbs.  Medium is perfect.  Got to wear under a low back top.  I love that I don’t have to wear a bra with it.  Will definitely buy other colors

评论概述: Nice material, but as a woman with pit-tit fat, IT'S A NO for me!
评论详情: I really wanted to love this because the material feels nice and the back looks awesome, but by god the damn straps are horrible and accentuate any side boob or armpit fat! I tried removing the padded cups (which are also thicker than normal and sit kind of high) to attempt to rearrange, but no version felt comfortable around my arms. Cool in theory, just not a great for someone who is self conscious in that area in the first place. I'm 5 foot 4, 150 and got a size medium for reference.
I am disappointed that this product came covered in white deoderant stains and also the removable padding was missing....
I love this so much I definitely will be purchasing more in different colors!
This bra top is so much nicer than I expected! Comfortable and cute! Perfect for a low back dress or  shirt!
The sports bra is a little snug for my comfort and I normally wear a medium.  The bra was cute enough when I tried it on I re-ordered a size up.
I cannot explain enough how much i love this item! i have a bigger chest and it fits perfectly on me. very flattering and comfortable!! definitely worth the purchase!
Love this shirt, perfect amount of short and tight and comes with padding so no strapless bra even needed!! So many compliments on it and not see through at all

I really like this tank! The back is super cute and just the right touch of cleavage to not distract from the back. I ordered the lime green and the black both in XS as I’m typically an XS in athletic tops. I removed the padding as I do with all my athletic tops, and it’s a snug fit which I like, but, I’m wondering if S would be better… or if it would create looseness near the armpits like I’ve read in other reviews?? I’m a 34” bust (32C) and 23.5” waist though I do have defined lats and some muscle to my back. I’ve worn these tops to the gym many times now to lift and they’ve been great. The material is soft and somewhat sweat wicking, the straps stay in place, bust feels secure, and it’s comfortable overall. I’ve received compliments on it, too :)  All in all, great top for the $. I think I’ll buy the white one now in both XS and S to see which size I really like best…

I have it in black & white as well. I want allll the colors :) It does kinda ride under the armpits a bit, but I got used to it and don’t really mind it. Otherwise it fits great and I get lots of compliments on these tops.

I had previously purchased a small, local company’s very similar version of this top, but it ran way too small (I’m normally a M and sized up to their largest size L and couldn’t get it over my gymnast shoulders and lats). When this popped up on my Amazon feed, I was intrigued, especially since I saw it came in XL. However, after reading reviews that said this ran large, I decided to take a chance and order the L - so glad I did! This fits great! There is an extra piece of fabric in the armpit area that actually wraps around my lats and lays flat, and the straps stay up! It’s soooo cute and flattering, this will be the perfect top for climbing! If you don’t have broader shoulders / lats, I might recommend sizing down because of the extra fabric, but it works for me! And I love the red color! I might pick up another color once this goes back on sale!  5’6, 34D for reference.
5' 7" 136 lbs. Originally ordered Medium but it was too tight. Just tried on the Large and love it. Haven't washed it yet but hope it washes well how I usually wash bras
Red is my Favorite color. Looks amazing, love the back style and fit is right on. Size M. 34 D I’m fit not skinny.
So cute and u don't have to wear a bra ,,has padding ,
Material and quality are worth the 5 star rating. However, I sized up because of the reviews and it ended up being too big overall. Returning to order my size.
Great quality, flattering, and supportive.

This same top is sold by a few companies, not sure if they all use the same fabric and exact cut, but the style looks identical. The fabric used on this one is the same as a lot of companies use for their "align dupe" leggings, which I can tell will get pilled as easily through normal wear and machine washing as the leggings I have with that fabric, and will pill even more if you carry a bag against it. There were some loose threads when it arrived, but overall, the quality is what you'd expect at this price. I am 5'3, 120lbs, athletic build, and usually wear a small in tops. The medium is a little small on me, but the large is a little loose at the top so I would only wear that for comfy casual wear and would wear the medium for anything active. Both look really cute and it feels like the straps will stay put.

I've been eyeing this sports bra for a long time and finally decided to pull the trigger on it. I don't have extremely broad shoulders, but I lift often and so I'd say they're wider than someone who doesn't. I'm typically a size 12 in tops, so I ordered a Large. It fits fine, but I think if I sized up it would fit a little better. The bra rolls up in the front making it a lot more cropped than I'm comfortable with. The straps don't want to stay in place and roll down the shoulders.  I will continue to wear the one I purchased, it's not a bad bra, just not at all what I expected and too much maintenance to want to buy more colors.

评论概述: Cloud fade mocha Runs a bit small
评论详情: I got this exact top in black and it’s like a completely different material and fits much better. Black is a 10/10
This had full padding, but was very tight to get on. Very soft.

Absolutely love this top, my only notes are that the color did not match at all. I ordered the bubblegum-looking pink, and it came in more like a dusty purple-pink. Which is okay... but I specifically was trying to add that pink to my closet, lol. Besides that, the straps sit a little awkward, but that may be my build. Still love this thing!

评论概述: Order a size down. Love the feel of the soft material
评论详情: I am normally a size small but was suggested to order a size down, to a X-Small. Great fit!  The material was nice and soft. The low back cut was really attractive and I love it.  The only downside, the strap fittings above the armpit cut, it was a little too high making the front unattractive nor flattering when worn alone.
I was looking for a "backless" sports bra and this is a great product.  It fits true to size, is soft, made well, and supportive.  I ordered black, but they offer many colors.
I love the length and open back. Not much support in cardio however I still wear it on the stationary bike but if you’re just doing weights or lifting I would suggest it.
Love the way it feels but it will rise up! Not as long as it states!

What I don’t like is the straps fall off my shoulders because the straps are spaced too far apart but other than that I wear this all the time it’s super comfortable to just lounge in and it has the pads inside

评论概述: Good quality, feels like it could fall off
评论详情: The quality is great. The material is very soft and flattering. The fit didn’t work for me. I didn’t like how it fit around the arm pits and the straps felt like they were going to fall off my shoulders the whole time. It felt insecure enough that I am going to return it.

I love this top. I stopped a gal at the gym and asked her about her top combo and she mentioned Amazon for this one and I said “score”! I ordered it that same night. Amazon did recommend a large for me which is larger than my normal top size of medium. I tried medium (black top) and it didn’t feel quite right so I returned and ordered a large in paradise green. I tried on the large in paradise green and that felt even less right and it was really loose around my arm pits (see photo). This was a hard one for me because I don’t want to fall out of it but I want support. End result - I returned the large and got both colors in Medium (which ended up being the recommended size for me by Amazon that time around). What a poop show. For reference I have an athletic build, broad shoulders and a small waist. I am 5’4”, 160lbs and wear a 34D/DD bra. Size 8 in lululemon bras if that also helps at all.

i have been in search of a backless sports bra for the gym but i was too scared because of my bigger chest. i came across this one, expecting it to not fit but i was WRONG. for reference i’m 5’7 and my bra size is a 34ddd (which makes it even harder to find sports bras because i have a large chest and a smaller band size). i stayed true to my size (medium) and the straps are the perfect length, but the bra part is also very supportive. i wouldn’t necessarily go sprinting in this bra but i feel like i can jog comfortably, however i’ll mainly use it for pull day. i don’t feel like im restricted or spilling out. this is SO worth the money!!

评论概述: The front straps are in a weird spot
评论详情: I didn't like where the front straps were on the front of me. I really loved the open back and I feel that maybe they had to be further inward to support the design, but I didn't like the look.
This workout top is perfect. It looks like something from Lululemon or Athleta, but for a fraction of the price. I have it in two colors and plan to buy more.
Need this in every color! The girls feel nice and secure without feeling like I’m suffocating. I’m a 34DD and got my usual size M. True to size, buttery soft material.

评论概述: Love the fit and style! Just not sweat showing
评论详情: Like the title states, this top feels and looks amazing. So soft and comfortable with a sexy back. The only reason I gave 4 stars was the fact that sweat shows badly. I got this top in a beautiful brown color but after a short walk had major boob sweat showing… and because the cut of armpits are a little high, sweat also shows under the arms. I bet black will look amazing but unfortunately I don’t see myself ordering the other colors. Such a bummer!
My go to favorite comfy bra!!! Sexy too almost backless I am a 34DDD and XS works for me!

It’s really cute. The padding in the white bra is very clearly visible through the fabric. I expected it would be, which is why I got a smaller size than I normally would have so I could still have a tight fit without the padding. It fits fine without it, only thing is people are going to be able to tell it you get a little nipply. Doesn’t really bother me all that much, we all know they’re there. The straps are a bit uncomfortable, but it might just be because I’m not used to them, it could also be because I got a smaller size.

评论概述: Love it but size down maybe
评论详情: I really love this sports bra and it's super flattering...my only complaint is I feel like the shelf bra isn't as snug as it should be. It sort of sits off my chest (like its floating) instead of right underneath my boobs. I might size down next time, but the back part of the bra (the crossed piece) feels snug already, so idk. It seems like some parts of the bra are perfectly snug and supportive and some parts (the shelf) are way too loose.

This is really cute and soft, I have small boobs but the bra part on this is very nice and the padding actually makes it look like i have boobs instead of compressing them. However because of the nature of the design, the straps don’t really stay put. They’re so far out because there is no back that they don’t sit where they normally would on your shoulders and I find myself having to put them up a lot. Same goes for the front and sides on the bottom. Because the material is being pulled up in the back, the front rides up a lot.

Is this a supportive top to wear for high intensity workouts? No. Is it super cute and flattering? Absolutely. I want to buy it in all the colors.  I got a large. I’m 5’7 150lbs with 34 dd. It’s roomy so I probably could have gotten a medium but I’m afraid sizing down would be too tight.

Overall it is a cute style with the open back. Shipping was quick as well. I typically fit in a small for most sports bra’s and tops. The fit on this felt really small and the straps did not feel secure like they’ll stay in place. If I made any stretching movements, they would fall right off my shoulder, I am returning this but maybe it was just the incorrect size. Personally, I’m not going to buy another one of this style but may try one of their other sport bras

Love the open back of this top! Very open, great for the pickleball court so I can tan my back Has pads so no exposure of the girls The straps kind of fall off a little but not a huge deal Would buy again!
The straps are not adjustable and it does not fit right if you have a larger chest
I absolutely love this sports bra. Not Only can you wear it for the gym but also dress it up. It’s so comfortable, flattering, and feels so fresh.
First I only ordered one because I wanted to see if it had good support and good quality. I really liked it and have already ordered other colors.
In addition to looking great, this top is so comfy!! I obviously wear this at the gym but I’m even wearing this around the house now!!
Like a glove

评论用户: Smooths but does not suck in. Maybe size down. It moved down less than an hour into wearing it and moving around.
评论详情: It's cute and accents your back well but the straps are weirdly in close to your chest, in the front rather then the usual straps closer to your arm pits. So that makes it a bit uncomfortable to wear
Love the color and style. My only note is that the straps are a tinyyyyy bit short and would have loved the ability to lengthen them. Still works, the straps are just a wee bit tight.

It’s cute but I don’t like the straps- the other reviews are right they do get loose and makes the top a little weird. It’s prob okay for a walk but I wouldn’t use it or an actual work out not even yoga

评论概述: Cute but cut is not great.
评论详情: Very cute but the area under the arms is too high. Would be uncomfortable with prolonged wear. Most tops I wear a medium but this didn’t work. Might try a large just incase.
